Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: EMT was induced by addition of Recombinant Human TGF-β1 (HEK293 cell derived) (PeproTech, USA 100-21) to a final concentration of 5ng/ml. EMT was also induced by overexpression of Zeb1 transcription factor. HMLE cells transfected with FUW plasmid, a tetracycline operator, and minimal CMV promoter(Brambrink et al., 2008) were used and Zeb1 gene overexpression was induced by addition of doxycycline (Sigma, D3447) to a final concentration of 1g/ml. All cells under induction were passaged once they reached 80% confluence.
Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: HMLE and all derived cell lines used in this work were cultured in MEGM (Mammary Epithelial Cell Growth Medium) media (Lonza, USA, CC-3051). Cells were cultured in round tissue culture dishes 10cm in diameter (Corning, USA) and split to a ratio of 1:7 every 2 to 3 days or once they reached 80% confluence on a plate. All cell dissociations were performed using TrypLE™ (Ambion, USA) reagent. For the ATAC-seq HMLE cells were induced with TGF-beta (5 ng/mL, replenished every day) and grown for 8 days. TGF-beta induced HMLE cells were removed from the cell culture plate with TrypLE treatment, washed twice in 1X PBS buffer, and stained with DAPI dye and Anti-Human/Mouse CD44 (PE-Cyanine 7) antibody. The stained cells were then analyzed by flow cytometry and the top 3% (n
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: All cell dissociations were performed using TrypLE™ (Ambion, USA) reagent., scRNA-seq libraries were constructed following the InDrop protocol(Klein et al., 2015). ATAC-Seq was done following (Buenrostro et al., 2013).
Sample_data_processing: ATAC-seq processing using Trimmomatic v0.36, bowtie2, MAPQ, samtools, MACS2, FIMO, InDrop single cell RNA-seq processing using SEQC v0.1.8rc3
Supplementary_files_format_and_content: ATAC-seq peaks; ATACseq_peaks_motifs_meta.txt with column header information; Count matrices; cb*.txt with indrop barcodes
